programme.title: MXGP of Switzerland, Frauenfeld
programme.desc: Lap after lap of international motorsports action. This is coverage from the FIM (Fédération Internationale de Motocyclisme) Motocross World Championship where riders from all over the globe compete in high-octane, fast-paced motocross racing. Competitors battle it out in races lasting 35 minutes plus 2 laps per race.

programme.title: Grand Prix of Israel, Jerusalem, Pais Arena
programme.desc: FIM SuperEnduro World Championship has been held since 2007. Its circuits are built inside stadiums or arenas, recreating obstacles such as rocks, boulders and logs. The championship consists of eight Grands Prix spread around the globe on courses that are mostly off-road. These events are split into two days and two different races, after which the points towards the world championship are awarded. Each round includes a motocross test and an extreme test, in addition to the enduro test.

programme.title: Australian Motocross Championship
programme.desc: The Australian ProMX Championship is the nation's premier motocross championship. The series acts as a successful development platform for young Australian talent and is designed as a tiered system with three dedicated classes: MX3 for younger drivers, the MX2 for senior drivers and the MX1, which is the elite category in the championship.

programme.title: Grand Prix of Spain, Pamplona
programme.desc: FIM X-Trial World Championship is the most prestigious indoor motorcycle trials tournament of the world, organised by the Fédération Internationale de Motocyclisme. The programme presents the highlights of the rounds where the participants have to take on the challenging tracks full of steep climbs and huge rocks.

programme.title: Victoria
programme.desc: Aucune description

programme.title: Stunt Heroes (The Canonball) S1 (n°13)
programme.desc: «The Canonball»The Stunt Heroes from Action Concept are still at their ski resort and party hard. This time they prepared a spectacular stunt involving a station wagon. It is thrown 50 meters into the air with a cannon and if everything goes according to plan, the high-flying car crashes into a second car on the field.

programme.title: Supercars S6
programme.desc: Almost every car manufacturer has their own tuning company, where models improve in performance and get a sportier look. However, for many customers this is not enough. Individuality is the key. Those customers are the target group of smaller tuning companies like Performmaster. Their version of the C63 AMG S features 612 hp instead of 510 hp and a maximum torque of 840 Nm instead of 700 Nm.

programme.title: Classic Ride S7
programme.desc: Cruising like in "Miss Marple" times. The 1947 Triumph 1800 Roadster has space for 5 fresh air fans. Le Jog - the toughest classic car rally in Europe. A German women's team takes on the challenge in the VW Iltis. In addition, charming small Cabriolet from the brass age. The 1919 Wolseley Stellite.

programme.title: Episode 6
programme.desc: Street Racers is your backstage pass to the world of Formula E. Every two weeks, the magazine takes a look behind the scenes of the most important electric car racing series and provides reviews, current news, exciting interviews and gripping background reports from the world of Formula E.

programme.title: Ferrari Challenge Europe
programme.desc: The Ferrari Challenge Europe is back for another season on Motorvision.TV. The longest-running single-make series championship in the history of the Prancing Horse-company promises high performance and talented drivers on challenging tracks around Europe. Seven events are scheduled for the 2022 season including the Finali Mondiali, which brings together the final stages of all Ferrari Challenge divisions around the world.

programme.title: Quattro the New Dimension 1985
programme.desc: With the introduction of the Group D-Monsters in the World Rally Championships, the fight for the title got harder and harder. Thats why Audi brought a strong trump onto the road in 1985 - The Sport Quattro. And with it began a new dimension.

programme.title: The Duels in Formula 1 - Face off for the crown
programme.desc: Fierce battles for championship titles, fierce duels for race victories and even disputes among teammates: Motorsports has been marked by feuds since its inception. The Formula One World Championship is full of heated rivalries, too, and fierce duels are a regular occurrence in the series. Racing Files looks back on the most exciting championship battles in the world's most important racing competition.

programme.title: Automobilisme : Grand Prix de Monaco historique
programme.desc: Do you miss the thrilling motorsports from yesteryear? Take a trip with Motorvision.TV to the French Riviera, when the Grand Prix de Monaco Historique turns back the wheel of time and brings back legendary racing cars for one more adrenaline-filled race featuring high speeds, risky maneuvers and head-to-head fights that we all love in motorsports.

programme.title: Classic Ride S2
programme.desc: ""on Ice"".

programme.title: Chateau Impney Hill Climb
programme.desc: Motorsports has been taken place at the Château Impney near Droitwich Spa in Worcestershire, England since the 1950s. But no event was as big and successful as the Chateau Impney Hill Climb. Every year, the event attracts a wide array of vintage cars and more modern supercars. However, 2019 sees the last edition of the iconic Chateau Impney Hill Climb.

programme.title: The Present
programme.desc: Green Hell". "Gone to Hell.

programme.title: Stunt Heroes (The White Army) S1 (n°12)
programme.desc: «The White Army»The Stunt Heroes from Action Concept leave their headquarters behind and travel to a ski resort. Between the trees of a nearby forest they simulate the attack of an army of white-dressed soldiers. As part of this spectacular stunt they want to make a car explode and fly through the air.

programme.title: Supercars S6
programme.desc: If we should build our dream garage ther would be a Rolly Royce Phantom, an Aston Martin DBS Superleggera as well as the Audi RS4! A car for every occasion.

programme.title: Classic Ride S6
programme.desc: Revisiting the past to portray the classic and veteran cars of decades gone by, meeting the personalities who wrote automotive history, sending very old cars running round very fast circuits.

programme.title: Episode 5
programme.desc: Street Racers is your backstage pass to the world of Formula E. Every two weeks, the magazine takes a look behind the scenes of the most important electric car racing series and provides reviews, current news, exciting interviews and gripping background reports from the world of Formula E.

programme.title: Ferrari Challenge Europe
programme.desc: The Ferrari Challenge Europe is back for another season on Motorvision.TV. The longest-running single-make series championship in the history of the Prancing Horse-company promises high performance and talented drivers on challenging tracks around Europe. Seven events are scheduled for the 2022 season including the Finali Mondiali, which brings together the final stages of all Ferrari Challenge divisions around the world.

programme.title: Jet Ski World Series
programme.desc: The ""WGP#1 World Series"" is a jet-ski championship with events in Europe, the US and Asia.

programme.title: Season Review
programme.desc: In 2022, the UIM is once again hosting its Formula 1 World Championship in Powerboat. In the 37th season, ten teams with 19 drivers from eleven countries have signed up to fight for the title of the new world champion in three Grand Prix.

programme.title: Australian V8 Superboats Championship
programme.desc: The Australian V8 Superboat Championship is one of the most important watersports series from down under. Drivers compete in three different classes: the LS Class, Group A and Unlimited, which features hardly any restrictions regarding engine sizes. In 2022, a total of seven rounds are scheduled before a new champion is crowned.

programme.title: Powerboat: P1 USA AquaX Championship
programme.desc: See all the action from the USA series of P1 AquaX, an exciting Jet Ski racing event, operated by Powerboat P1. P1 AquaX is an international motorboat racing competition organised by the Union Internationale Motornautique.

programme.title: UIM Class 1 Powerboat Championship
programme.desc: Want to cool down? The Class 1 Offshore Championship featuring boats with twin inboard 1100hp engines that can reach speeds in excess of 160mph. All boats, which are around 12-14 meters long and 3.5 meters wide, are limited by a minimum weight of 4,950 kilos.

programme.title: P1 Offshore Championship
programme.desc: The P1 Offshore Powerboat Championship promises tightly fought offshore racing with powerboats reaching top speeds of up to 100 miles per hour. Five events are schedules for the 2022 season and Motorvision.TV brings you all the thrilling action from each event!

programme.title: Stunt Heroes (Body Stunt Highlights) S2 (n°14)
programme.desc: «Body Stunt Highlights»Today it's Action Concepts most popular and most spectacular body stunts: Jumping from rooftops, falling of a driving car, tumbling down stairs. Despite inevitable wounds, the legendary stunt crew enjoys the job.

programme.title: Supercars S6
programme.desc: There are details which set super cars apart from normal cars and these details are essential. Super cars are the biggest, loudest and most expensive cars on the highway; they're four-wheeled works of arts.

programme.title: Classic Ride S1
programme.desc: Once a year Russian vintage fans meet at a spots stadium in Moscow Sports for the Retro Style, a vintage rally through Moscow. Classic Ride takes advantage of the opportunity to celebrate the passion for old cars with Russan drivers. Once ahead of its time, the Citroen SM is now a rare collector's item. Classic Rides takes a look at the French diva with an Italian heart.

programme.title: Episode 7
programme.desc: Street Racers is your backstage pass to the world of Formula E. Every two weeks, the magazine takes a look behind the scenes of the most important electric car racing series and provides reviews, current news, exciting interviews and gripping background reports from the world of Formula E.

programme.title: AWD Safari Challenge
programme.desc: Watch the exciting Safari Championship organized by the British All Wheel Drive Club, in which modified 4x4 vehicles of all brands can participate.

programme.title: Hi-Tec Drift Allstars Series Australia
programme.desc: The latest drifting competition on Motorvision.TV brings you the best drifters from Australia. Join us for thrilling duels, smoking wheels and non-stop drift battles for the Drift All Stars Series title.

programme.desc: Aucune description

programme.title: Top Fuel Australia Championship
programme.desc: Aucune description

programme.title: National Legend Cars
programme.desc: The Legends Cars National Championship brings back racing from yesteryear. The series features 5/8 scale replicas of pre-war 1930s Fords, Chevys and Dodges that are equipped with 125bhp-motorcycle engines. These cars are well known for delivering high-octane battles on race tracks around Great Britain.

programme.title: Stunt Heroes (The Pile-Up) S1 (n°11)
programme.desc: «The Pile-Up»Fog, darkness and a pileup involving multiple cars: It's a scene that you can often see on highways and it's a scene that the Stunt Heroes from Action Concept want to recreate as part of a stunt with burning people, a late arriving fireman and a car that flies through the air. It's a matter of manpower, courage, trust â?" and perfect timing.

programme.title: Supercars S6
programme.desc: See the Audi R8 Quattro Performance and the Huracan Evo getting an powerfull update along with the faceliftof the Porsche Macan S with ist ne V6 Engine.

programme.title: Classic Ride S6
programme.desc: Luxurious coupes with 12 cylinders! The Jaguar XJC V12 purrs like a kitten and growls like a wild cat. BMW 850. The high-tech luxury coupe from Bavaria tried to snatch the clientele from Mercedes-Benz. A luxury Ferrari on the track. This 250 GTE writes in the sixties racing history.
